title: Breeds of Dogs
description: Breeds of Dogs introduces readers to seven different groups of dog breeds. These include working and sporting breeds. The beloved family mutt is also discussed. Special features of various dogs are highlighted, and photos show the range of size, shape, and hair quality.
meta: breeds, herding dogs, hounds, mixed breed, purebred, sporting dogs, terriers, toy dogs, working dogs
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast information in text
Vowel Digraphs : Identify vowel digraphs ee and ea
Pronouns : Identify and use possessive pronouns

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
